name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Network Engineer with over 10 years of expertise in designing and delivering robust network systems, with a strong focus on **TCP/IP**, **BGP**, **OSPF**, **EIGRP**, and **VLANs**. Proficient in implementing and managing **VPNs**, **firewalls**, **proxies**, and **load balancers**, ensuring high availability and security of network communications. Skilled in troubleshooting complex network issues, leveraging analytical and problem-solving abilities to optimize performance. Previous experience in high-stakes environments, demonstrating a commitment to maintaining cutting-edge standards. Additionally, familiar with backend development and cloud-native architectures, bringing an edge to network integration with insights from **AWS** and **Azure** for enhanced operational efficiency. Proven record of contributing to impactful projects at top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
